attributes.action: Stop private landlords taking the whole years rent if student gave up the course
attributes.additional_details: My daughter suffered with mental health after Covid lockdown and grades changed, she moved into a flat to start uni but was unable to stay due to mental health, she stayed one night in the property but we still have to pay for the whole year which I can’t afford and she won’t get a student loan as she didn’t do the course.
attributes.background: Stop the landlord from charging students rent when they have moved back home due to Covid

rejection.details:
Suspending payments for rent or ending a tenancy early is a matter for individual landlords, and not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Enable all students to end university tenancy agreements early due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735

Implement support for university students during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554299
